title: The friendship theorem for small graphs

blocks.name: frgr1v
blocks.content: Any graph with (at most) one vertex is a friendship graph. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 4-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 29-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm frgr1v(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wceq(cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(c1))), wcel(c0, cfrgr))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wceq(cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(c1))), wcel(c0, cfrgr), wcel(c0, cusgr), wral(hs1, cfv(cvtx, c0), wral(hs2, cdif(cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(cv(hs1))), wreu(hs0, cfv(cvtx, c0), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c0))))))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cusgr), wceq(cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(c1)))
  mpbiri(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wceq(cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(c1))), wral(hs1, cfv(cvtx, c0), wral(hs2, cdif(cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(cv(hs1))), wreu(hs0, cfv(cvtx, c0), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c0))))), wral(hs1, csn(c1), wral(hs2, cdif(csn(c1), csn(cv(hs1))), wreu(hs0, csn(c1), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c0))))))
  pm2.61i(wral(hs1, csn(c1), wral(hs2, cdif(csn(c1), csn(cv(hs1))), wreu(hs0, csn(c1), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c0))))), wcel(c1, universe))
  mpbiri(wcel(c1, universe), wral(hs1, csn(c1), wral(hs2, cdif(csn(c1), csn(cv(hs1))), wreu(hs0, csn(c1), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c0))))), wral(hs2, emptycls, wreu(hs0, csn(c1), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), c1), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c0)))))
  ral0(hs2, wreu(hs0, csn(c1), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), c1), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c0))))
  ralsng(hs1, c1, universe, wral(hs2, cdif(csn(c1), csn(cv(hs1))), wreu(hs0, csn(c1), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c0)))), wral(hs2, emptycls, wreu(hs0, csn(c1), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), c1), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c0)))))
  raleqbidv(hs2, cdif(csn(c1), csn(cv(hs1))), emptycls, wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wreu(hs0, csn(c1), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c0))), wreu(hs0, csn(c1), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), c1), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c0))))
  syl6eq(cdif(csn(c1), csn(cv(hs1))), emptycls, cdif(csn(c1), csn(c1)), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  difeq2d(csn(c1), csn(cv(hs1)), csn(c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  sneq(cv(hs1), c1)
  difid(csn(c1))
  reubidv(hs0, csn(c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c0)), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), c1), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c0)))
  sseq1d(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c0), cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), c1), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  preq1d(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cpr(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  preq2(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs0))
  sylbi(wn(wcel(c1, universe)), wral(hs1, csn(c1), wral(hs2, cdif(csn(c1), csn(cv(hs1))), wreu(hs0, csn(c1), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c0))))), wceq(csn(c1), emptycls))
  snprc(c1)
  rzal(hs1, csn(c1), wral(hs2, cdif(csn(c1), csn(cv(hs1))), wreu(hs0, csn(c1), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c0)))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cusgr), wceq(cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(c1)), wb(wral(hs1, cfv(cvtx, c0), wral(hs2, cdif(cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(cv(hs1))), wreu(hs0, cfv(cvtx, c0), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c0))))), wral(hs1, csn(c1), wral(hs2, cdif(csn(c1), csn(cv(hs1))), wreu(hs0, csn(c1), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c0)))))))
  raleqbidv(hs1, cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(c1), wceq(cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(c1)), wral(hs2, cdif(cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(cv(hs1))), wreu(hs0, cfv(cvtx, c0), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c0)))), wral(hs2, cdif(csn(c1), csn(cv(hs1))), wreu(hs0, csn(c1), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c0)))))
  id(wceq(cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(c1)))
  raleqbidv(hs2, cdif(cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(cv(hs1))), cdif(csn(c1), csn(cv(hs1))), wceq(cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(c1)), wreu(hs0, cfv(cvtx, c0), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c0))), wreu(hs0, csn(c1), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c0))))
  difeq1(cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(c1), csn(cv(hs1)))
  reueq1(hs0, cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(c1), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c0)))
  frgrusgrfrcond(hs1, hs2, hs0, c0, cfv(cvtx, c0), cfv(cedg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cvtx, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cedg, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.w(wral(hs2, emptycls, wreu(hs0, csn(c1), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), c1), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c0)))))
  diff.hs2.w(wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  diff.hs1.c(csn(c1))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(c1)))
  diff.hs2.w(wceq(cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cvtx, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(csn(c1))
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cvtx, c0))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(cfv(cvtx, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

thm frgr1v(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà USGraph ‚àß(Vtx ` c0)= { c1 })‚Üí c0 ‚àà FriendGraph)
} = {
  sylanbrc((c0 ‚àà USGraph ‚àß(Vtx ` c0)= { c1 }), c0 ‚àà FriendGraph, c0 ‚àà USGraph, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà(Vtx ` c0), ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà((Vtx ` c0)\ { hs1 }), ‚àÉ!(hs0 ‚àà(Vtx ` c0), { { hs0, hs1 }, { hs0, hs2 } } ‚äÜ(Edg ` c0)))))
  simpl(c0 ‚àà USGraph, (Vtx ` c0)= { c1 })
  mpbiri((c0 ‚àà USGraph ‚àß(Vtx ` c0)= { c1 }), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà(Vtx ` c0), ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà((Vtx ` c0)\ { hs1 }), ‚àÉ!(hs0 ‚àà(Vtx ` c0), { { hs0, hs1 }, { hs0, hs2 } } ‚äÜ(Edg ` c0)))), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà { c1 }, ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà({ c1 } \ { hs1 }), ‚àÉ!(hs0 ‚àà { c1 }, { { hs0, hs1 }, { hs0, hs2 } } ‚äÜ(Edg ` c0)))))
  pm2.61i(‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà { c1 }, ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà({ c1 } \ { hs1 }), ‚àÉ!(hs0 ‚àà { c1 }, { { hs0, hs1 }, { hs0, hs2 } } ‚äÜ(Edg ` c0)))), c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  mpbiri(c1 ‚àà ùïå, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà { c1 }, ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà({ c1 } \ { hs1 }), ‚àÉ!(hs0 ‚àà { c1 }, { { hs0, hs1 }, { hs0, hs2 } } ‚äÜ(Edg ` c0)))), ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà ‚àÖ, ‚àÉ!(hs0 ‚àà { c1 }, { { hs0, c1 }, { hs0, hs2 } } ‚äÜ(Edg ` c0))))
  ral0(hs2, ‚àÉ!(hs0 ‚àà { c1 }, { { hs0, c1 }, { hs0, hs2 } } ‚äÜ(Edg ` c0)))
  ralsng(hs1, c1, universe, ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà({ c1 } \ { hs1 }), ‚àÉ!(hs0 ‚àà { c1 }, { { hs0, hs1 }, { hs0, hs2 } } ‚äÜ(Edg ` c0))), ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà ‚àÖ, ‚àÉ!(hs0 ‚àà { c1 }, { { hs0, c1 }, { hs0, hs2 } } ‚äÜ(Edg ` c0))))
  raleqbidv(hs2, ({ c1 } \ { hs1 }), emptycls, hs1 = c1, ‚àÉ!(hs0 ‚àà { c1 }, { { hs0, hs1 }, { hs0, hs2 } } ‚äÜ(Edg ` c0)), ‚àÉ!(hs0 ‚àà { c1 }, { { hs0, c1 }, { hs0, hs2 } } ‚äÜ(Edg ` c0)))
  syl6eq(({ c1 } \ { hs1 }), emptycls, ({ c1 } \ { c1 }), hs1 = c1)
  difeq2d({ c1 }, { hs1 }, { c1 }, hs1 = c1)
  sneq(hs1, c1)
  difid({ c1 })
  reubidv(hs0, { c1 }, hs1 = c1, { { hs0, hs1 }, { hs0, hs2 } } ‚äÜ(Edg ` c0), { { hs0, c1 }, { hs0, hs2 } } ‚äÜ(Edg ` c0))
  sseq1d({ { hs0, hs1 }, { hs0, hs2 } }, (Edg ` c0), { { hs0, c1 }, { hs0, hs2 } }, hs1 = c1)
  preq1d({ hs0, hs1 }, { hs0, hs2 }, { hs0, c1 }, hs1 = c1)
  preq2(hs1, c1, hs0)
  sylbi(¬¨ c1 ‚àà ùïå, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà { c1 }, ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà({ c1 } \ { hs1 }), ‚àÉ!(hs0 ‚àà { c1 }, { { hs0, hs1 }, { hs0, hs2 } } ‚äÜ(Edg ` c0)))), { c1 } = ‚àÖ)
  snprc(c1)
  rzal(hs1, { c1 }, ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà({ c1 } \ { hs1 }), ‚àÉ!(hs0 ‚àà { c1 }, { { hs0, hs1 }, { hs0, hs2 } } ‚äÜ(Edg ` c0))))
  adantl(c0 ‚àà USGraph, (Vtx ` c0)= { c1 }, (‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà(Vtx ` c0), ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà((Vtx ` c0)\ { hs1 }), ‚àÉ!(hs0 ‚àà(Vtx ` c0), { { hs0, hs1 }, { hs0, hs2 } } ‚äÜ(Edg ` c0))))‚Üî ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà { c1 }, ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà({ c1 } \ { hs1 }), ‚àÉ!(hs0 ‚àà { c1 }, { { hs0, hs1 }, { hs0, hs2 } } ‚äÜ(Edg ` c0))))))
  raleqbidv(hs1, (Vtx ` c0), { c1 }, (Vtx ` c0)= { c1 }, ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà((Vtx ` c0)\ { hs1 }), ‚àÉ!(hs0 ‚àà(Vtx ` c0), { { hs0, hs1 }, { hs0, hs2 } } ‚äÜ(Edg ` c0))), ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà({ c1 } \ { hs1 }), ‚àÉ!(hs0 ‚àà { c1 }, { { hs0, hs1 }, { hs0, hs2 } } ‚äÜ(Edg ` c0))))
  id((Vtx ` c0)= { c1 })
  raleqbidv(hs2, ((Vtx ` c0)\ { hs1 }), ({ c1 } \ { hs1 }), (Vtx ` c0)= { c1 }, ‚àÉ!(hs0 ‚àà(Vtx ` c0), { { hs0, hs1 }, { hs0, hs2 } } ‚äÜ(Edg ` c0)), ‚àÉ!(hs0 ‚àà { c1 }, { { hs0, hs1 }, { hs0, hs2 } } ‚äÜ(Edg ` c0)))
  difeq1((Vtx ` c0), { c1 }, { hs1 })
  reueq1(hs0, (Vtx ` c0), { c1 }, { { hs0, hs1 }, { hs0, hs2 } } ‚äÜ(Edg ` c0))
  frgrusgrfrcond(hs1, hs2, hs0, c0, (Vtx ` c0), (Edg ` c0))
  eqid((Vtx ` c0))
  eqid((Edg ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.w(‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà ‚àÖ, ‚àÉ!(hs0 ‚àà { c1 }, { { hs0, c1 }, { hs0, hs2 } } ‚äÜ(Edg ` c0))))
  diff.hs2.w(hs1 = c1)
  diff.hs0.w(hs1 = c1)
  diff.hs1.c({ c1 })
  diff.hs1.w((Vtx ` c0)= { c1 })
  diff.hs2.w((Vtx ` c0)= { c1 })
  diff.hs0.c((Vtx ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c({ c1 })
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c((Vtx ` c0))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c((Vtx ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: nfrgr2v
blocks.content: Any graph with two (different) vertices is not a friendship graph. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 30-Sep-2017.) (Proof shortened by Alexander van der Vekens, 13-Sep-2018.) (Revised by AV, 29-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfrgr2v(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wceq(cfv(cvtx, c4), cpr(c0, c2))), wnel(c4, cfrgr))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wceq(cfv(cvtx, c4), cpr(c0, c2))), wnel(c4, cfrgr)), wcel(c4, cusgr))
  expcom(wcel(c4, cusgr), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wceq(cfv(cvtx, c4), cpr(c0, c2))), wnel(c4, cfrgr))
  sylibr(wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wceq(cfv(cvtx, c4), cpr(c0, c2))), wcel(c4, cusgr)), wnel(c4, cfrgr), wn(wa(wcel(c4, cusgr), wral(hs1, cfv(cvtx, c4), wral(hs2, cdif(cfv(cvtx, c4), csn(cv(hs1))), wreu(hs0, cfv(cvtx, c4), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c4))))))))
  mpbird(wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wceq(cfv(cvtx, c4), cpr(c0, c2))), wcel(c4, cusgr)), wn(wa(wcel(c4, cusgr), wral(hs1, cfv(cvtx, c4), wral(hs2, cdif(cfv(cvtx, c4), csn(cv(hs1))), wreu(hs0, cfv(cvtx, c4), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c4))))))), wn(wa(wcel(c4, cusgr), wral(hs1, cpr(c0, c2), wral(hs2, cdif(cpr(c0, c2), csn(cv(hs1))), wreu(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c4))))))))
  adantlr(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wceq(cfv(cvtx, c4), cpr(c0, c2)), wcel(c4, cusgr), wn(wa(wcel(c4, cusgr), wral(hs1, cpr(c0, c2), wral(hs2, cdif(cpr(c0, c2), csn(cv(hs1))), wreu(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c4))))))))
  intnand(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wcel(c4, cusgr)), wcel(c4, cusgr), wral(hs1, cpr(c0, c2), wral(hs2, cdif(cpr(c0, c2), csn(cv(hs1))), wreu(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c4))))))
  sylib(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wcel(c4, cusgr)), wn(wral(hs1, cpr(c0, c2), wral(hs2, cdif(cpr(c0, c2), csn(cv(hs1))), wreu(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c4)))))), wrex(hs1, cpr(c0, c2), wn(wral(hs2, cdif(cpr(c0, c2), csn(cv(hs1))), wreu(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c4)))))))
  mpbird(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wcel(c4, cusgr)), wrex(hs1, cpr(c0, c2), wn(wral(hs2, cdif(cpr(c0, c2), csn(cv(hs1))), wreu(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c4)))))), wo(wn(wral(hs2, cdif(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c0)), wreu(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), c0), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c4))))), wn(wral(hs2, cdif(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c2)), wreu(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), c2), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c4)))))))
  mpbird(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wcel(c4, cusgr)), wo(wn(wral(hs2, cdif(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c0)), wreu(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), c0), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c4))))), wn(wral(hs2, cdif(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c2)), wreu(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), c2), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cedg, c4)))))), wo(wn(wreu(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), c0), cpr(cv(hs0), c2)), cfv(cedg, c4)))), wn(wreu(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), c2), cpr(cv(hs0), c0)), cfv(cedg, c4))))))
  orcd(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wcel(c4, cusgr)), wn(wreu(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), c0), cpr(cv(hs0), c2)), cfv(cedg, c4)))), wn(wreu(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), c2), cpr(cv(hs0), c0)), cfv(cedg, c4)))))

blocks.name: frgr3v
blocks.content: Any graph with three vertices which are completely connected with each other is a friendship graph. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 5-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 29-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm frgr3v(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), w3a(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c4), wne(c2, c4))), wi(wa(wceq(c6, ctp(c0, c2, c4)), wcel(c7, cusgr)), wb(wcel(c7, cfrgr), w3a(wcel(cpr(c0, c2), c8), wcel(cpr(c2, c4), c8), wcel(cpr(c4, c0), c8)))))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cvtx, c7))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(cedg, c7))
} = {
  ex(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), w3a(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c4), wne(c2, c4))), wa(wceq(c6, ctp(c0, c2, c4)), wcel(c7, cusgr)), wb(wcel(c7, cfrgr), w3a(wcel(cpr(c0, c2), c8), wcel(cpr(c2, c4), c8), wcel(cpr(c4, c0), c8))))
  3bitrd(wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), w3a(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c4), wne(c2, c4))), wa(wceq(c6, ctp(c0, c2, c4)), wcel(c7, cusgr))), wcel(c7, cfrgr), w3a(wcel(cpr(c0, c2), c8), wcel(cpr(c2, c4), c8), wcel(cpr(c4, c0), c8)), wral(hs1, ctp(c0, c2, c4), wral(hs2, cdif(ctp(c0, c2, c4), csn(cv(hs1))), wreu(hs0, ctp(c0, c2, c4), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), c8)))), w3a(wa(wreu(hs0, ctp(c0, c2, c4), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), c0), cpr(cv(hs0), c2)), c8)), wreu(hs0, ctp(c0, c2, c4), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), c0), cpr(cv(hs0), c4)), c8))), wa(wreu(hs0, ctp(c0, c2, c4), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), c2), cpr(cv(hs0), c4)), c8)), wreu(hs0, ctp(c0, c2, c4), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), c2), cpr(cv(hs0), c0)), c8))), wa(wreu(hs0, ctp(c0, c2, c4), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), c4), cpr(cv(hs0), c0)), c8)), wreu(hs0, ctp(c0, c2, c4), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), c4), cpr(cv(hs0), c2)), c8)))))
  bitrd(wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), w3a(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c4), wne(c2, c4))), wa(wceq(c6, ctp(c0, c2, c4)), wcel(c7, cusgr))), wcel(c7, cfrgr), wral(hs1, ctp(c0, c2, c4), wral(hs2, cdif(ctp(c0, c2, c4), csn(cv(hs1))), wreu(hs0, ctp(c0, c2, c4), wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), c8)))), wa(wcel(c7, cusgr), wral(hs1, c6, wral(hs2, cdif(c6, csn(cv(hs1))), wreu(hs0, c6, wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), c8))))))
  a1i(wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), w3a(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c4), wne(c2, c4))), wa(wceq(c6, ctp(c0, c2, c4)), wcel(c7, cusgr))), wb(wcel(c7, cfrgr), wa(wcel(c7, cusgr), wral(hs1, c6, wral(hs2, cdif(c6, csn(cv(hs1))), wreu(hs0, c6, wss(cpr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), c8)))))))
  frgrusgrfrcond(hs1, hs2, hs0, c7, c6, c8)

blocks.name: 1vwmgr
blocks.content: Every graph with one vertex (which may be connect with itself by (multiple) loops!) is a windmill graph. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 5-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 31-Mar-2021.)

blocks.name: 3vfriswmgr
blocks.content: Every friendship graph with three (different) vertices is a windmill graph. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 6-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 31-Mar-2021.)

blocks.name: 1to2vfriswmgr
blocks.content: Every friendship graph with one or two vertices is a windmill graph. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 6-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 31-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm 1to2vfriswmgr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wo(wceq(c2, csn(c0)), wceq(c2, cpr(c0, c3)))), wi(wcel(c4, cfrgr), wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c5), wreu(s2, cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2)), c5)))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cedg, c4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wo(wceq(c2, csn(c0)), wceq(c2, cpr(c0, c3)))), wi(wcel(c4, cfrgr), wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c5), wreu(s2, cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2)), c5))))))), wceq(c5, cfv(cedg, c4)))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wo(wceq(c2, csn(c0)), wceq(c2, cpr(c0, c3)))), wi(wcel(c4, cfrgr), wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c5), wreu(s2, cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2)), c5))))))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wo(wceq(c2, csn(c0)), wceq(c2, cpr(c0, c3)))), wi(wcel(c4, cfrgr), wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c5), wreu(s2, cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2)), c5))))))), diffsc(s1, c3))

blocks.name: 1to3vfriswmgr
blocks.content: Every friendship graph with one, two or three vertices is a windmill graph. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 6-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 31-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm 1to3vfriswmgr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3o(wceq(c2, csn(c0)), wceq(c2, cpr(c0, c3)), wceq(c2, ctp(c0, c3, c4)))), wi(wcel(c5, cfrgr), wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c6), wreu(s2, cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2)), c6)))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cedg, c5))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c6)

blocks.name: 1to3vfriendship
blocks.content: The friendship theorem for small graphs: In every friendship graph with one, two or three vertices, there is a vertex which is adjacent to all other vertices. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 6-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 31-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm 1to3vfriendship(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3o(wceq(c2, csn(c0)), wceq(c2, cpr(c0, c3)), wceq(c2, ctp(c0, c3, c4)))), wi(wcel(c5, cfrgr), wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c6)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cedg, c5))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3o(wceq(c2, csn(c0)), wceq(c2, cpr(c0, c3)), wceq(c2, ctp(c0, c3, c4)))), wi(wcel(c5, cfrgr), wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c6))))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3o(wceq(c2, csn(c0)), wceq(c2, cpr(c0, c3)), wceq(c2, ctp(c0, c3, c4)))), wi(wcel(c5, cfrgr), wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c6))))), diffsc(s1, c5))
  syl6(wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3o(wceq(c2, csn(c0)), wceq(c2, cpr(c0, c3)), wceq(c2, ctp(c0, c3, c4)))), wcel(c5, cfrgr), wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c6))), wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c6), wreu(hs0, cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cpr(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), c6))))))
  1to3vfriswmgr(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6)
  reximi(s0, c2, wral(s1, cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c6), wreu(hs0, cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cpr(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), c6)))), wral(s1, cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c6)))
  ralimi(s1, cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c6), wreu(hs0, cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cpr(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), c6))), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c6))
  adantr(wcel(cpr(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c6), wreu(hs0, cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cpr(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), c6)), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c6))
  biimpi(wcel(cpr(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c6), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c6))
  eleq1i(cpr(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c6, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  prcom(cv(s1), cv(s0))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 = { c0 } ‚à® c2 = { c0, c3 } ‚à® c2 = { c0, c3, c4 }))‚Üí(c5 ‚àà FriendGraph ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(c2 \ { s0 }), { s0, s1 } ‚àà c6))))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Vtx ` c5)

} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 = { c0 } ‚à® c2 = { c0, c3 } ‚à® c2 = { c0, c3, c4 }))‚Üí(c5 ‚àà FriendGraph ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(c2 \ { s0 }), { s0, s1 } ‚àà c6)))), d(s1, c1))

  1to3vfriswmgr(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6)
  reximi(s0, c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(c2 \ { s0 }),({ s1, s0 } ‚àà c6 ‚àß ‚àÉ!(hs0 ‚àà(c2 \ { s0 }), { s1, hs0 } ‚àà c6))), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(c2 \ { s0 }), { s0, s1 } ‚àà c6))
  ralimi(s1, (c2 \ { s0 }), ({ s1, s0 } ‚àà c6 ‚àß ‚àÉ!(hs0 ‚àà(c2 \ { s0 }), { s1, hs0 } ‚àà c6)), { s0, s1 } ‚àà c6)
  adantr({ s1, s0 } ‚àà c6, ‚àÉ!(hs0 ‚àà(c2 \ { s0 }), { s1, hs0 } ‚àà c6), { s0, s1 } ‚àà c6)
  biimpi({ s1, s0 } ‚àà c6, { s0, s1 } ‚àà c6)
  eleq1i({ s1, s0 }, c6, { s0, s1 })
  prcom(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)

  diff.hs0.c(c6)
